VFTResults¶

class VFTResults.VFTResults(GHT, VFI, MD, MDp, PSD, PSDp)¶

Bases: object

Information of the results of a VFT report

GHT¶

The Glaucoma Hemifield Test results.

VFI¶

The Visual Field index

MD¶

The mean deviation.

MDp¶

The p-value of the mean deviation.

PSD¶

The pattern deviation.

PSDp¶

The p-value of the pattern deviation.

__init__(GHT, VFI, MD, MDp, PSD, PSDp)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
